text: On Wednesday, HBO CEO Richard Plepler said his HBO Now streaming video on demand service has “ about 800, 000 ” paying subscribers. Those come in addition to the viewers who watch HBO on an ancient platform known as TV. We figured this was as good a time as any to update comparisons among the existing streaming options. So here they are, with pretty pictures and variably pretty statistics : HBO Now Like Plepler said, the SVOD option for HBO currently has “ about ” 800, 000 paying subscribers after eight months of existence. That ’ s a lower figure than Wall Street analysts wanted to see, but the service has yet to land on Xbox and PlayStation platforms.
